description: Capability settings control which features are enabled. Disabled capabilities will prevent related commands from executing.

fs.description: File system access - read, write, and modify files

process_control.description: Process management - view and control running processes

window_control.description: Window and GUI control - focus windows, click, type

browser_control.description: Browser automation - open URLs, control web pages

run_shell.description: Shell command execution - run system commands

clipboard.description: Clipboard access - read and write clipboard content

microphone.description: Voice input - record and process audio

system_info.description: System information - CPU, memory, disk usage

safety_notes.fs: File system access is limited to safe paths by default. Writing outside safe paths requires user confirmation.
safety_notes.process_control: Process termination is protected - system processes cannot be killed.
safety_notes.run_shell: Shell commands are extremely dangerous and require explicit password confirmation.
safety_notes.microphone: Voice recording data is stored locally and not transmitted externally.
